Consensys Suit Against U.S. SEC Dismissed by Texas Court https://www.coindesk.com/policy/2024/09/20/consensys-suit-against-us-sec-dismissed-by-texas-court/?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=rss&utm_campaign=headlines LBHA7XCTYFHLBP3RNRWXIJ7QGE Jesse HamiltonThe U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission had – for a time – added Consensys to a list of crypto investigation targets, prompting the technology incubator company to sue it for overreach in federal court.
